tasks.title: Dynamic Background Image in Angular Component
tasks.description: Implement functionality to dynamically set a background image in an Angular component using the [style] directive. Create a variable in the component for the image URL and update the background-image style based on this variable. Include a button in the template to change the image URL, ensuring the style updates correctly.
tasks.author: admin@taskman.com
